doc.title: Hey Guy
doc.plot: "guy", an unsuspicious wanderer on his way to the end and at the same time the beginning of his own self, becomes a victim of a seemingly simple object which becomes an unappreciated companion towards his own fate. With other words, there is a character stepping onto a slimy bubble gum, falling a few times, which is supposed to be funny, and when he blows up himself everything is over and starts again...
